postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Hi ladies,  
If you are looking to meet new girlfriends in Singapore to meet on regular base and to have a ladies night only. Well, than this group could be yours. We are looking to organise (for free of course) every 2 weeks a ladies night in our apartment. For us it doesn't matter what your age, believe or nationality is. We would like to build a strong friendship with everybody from the group. But, unfortunately the group is limited to max 8 ladies. At every event we can discuss what we would like to do on the next ladies night. Of course, having fun and a great time together is our main goal. If you are interested, please send your motivation. 
Describe yourself together with a motivation why you would like to be member of the group and include also 1 or more pictures from you. Please be patient for a reply. We will go trough all the profiles and contact you once we find you the perfect member. 
 
Hope to hear you soon!
title: Ladies night
